channel.title: git-tfs on Tim Van Wassenhove
channel.description: Recent content in git-tfs on Tim Van Wassenhove

item.title: Consume locally build software without overloading your $PATH
item.description: How do you consume locally build software? For a while now i have used the following approach: Create a ~/bin folder Add that ~/bin folder to my $PATH Add symlinks from binary to ~/bin (ln -s ~/src/git-tfs/GitTfs.Vs2010/bin/debug/git-tfs.exe git-tfs) Please let me know about your strategy..
